name: ExamGame
description:
In-game, click on the action icons on the bottom of the screen to make the avatar perform the specified action. 

Reach the goal portal to complete the level.

Use 1-9 + 0 keys to auto-switch between levels:

  1. Basics
  2. Deadly Walls
  3. Bouncy Platform
  4. Moving Deadly Walls
  5. Invisible Walls
  6. Moon Gravity
  7. Scrolling
  8. Tracking Enemies
  9. Moving Stone
  10. Ultimate challenge

Press R to reload the level

Press ESC to return to the main menu.

Reference:

Avatar: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/cartoon-ui-pack-200-sprites-70518

Environment: https://opengameart.org/content/2d-sunny-grassland-sprites-platformer-sidescroll...

Understanding of the game: pracs, lectures  and youtube
